overview: Nancy Schmaus, COO and Co-Founder of Kredits, is a 15-year veteran in the microfinance industry. Prior to starting Kredits in 1998, Ms. Schmaus was a Program Manager at Mercy Corps International, based in Kazakhstan, where she led the development of the organizationâ€™s first collateral-based, individual lending program. Earlier in her career, Ms. Schmaus held roles at FAPE / Opportunity International in Guatemala and at Save the Children. Ms. Schmaus is fluent in English and German and proficient in Russian and Spanish.
